name: Commander Caius
role: Field Commander assigned to Dragonsreach interior defense

aspects.trouble: I Act Before I Verify - Sometimes That's the Right Call
other_aspects: Loyal to the Legion, Pragmatic in Practice

stunts: First Responder: +2 to Command in the first exchange of any combat; allies gain +1 to their first action.
Rapid Assessment: Can assess an enemy's stress track (visible to GM) once per scene with a successful Notice vs Average.

personality_notes.speaking_style: Rapid, declarative sentences. Reports facts first, opinions second. Trusts his instincts.
quirks: Always enters rooms looking for the tallest threat first
Respects Legate Cipius even when they disagree

relationships.Legate Cipius: Professional respect; they complement each other well
relationships.Legate Rikke: Direct superior; follows her orders precisely

combat_tactics: Caius fights aggressively in close quarters but always maintains awareness of escape routes. Will sacrifice position to save allies.
scene_triggers: Battle of Whiterun Stage 1 (Imperial defense - Dragonsreach breach)
War Room Briefing Stage 0 (as tactical reference)
